scripts.install:showcase-ios: yarn initialize && cd demos/showcase && yarn && cd ios && pod install && cd ../../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:showcase-android: yarn initialize && cd demos/showcase && yarn && cd ../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:storybook-ios: cd demos/storybook && yarn && cd ios && pod install && cd ../../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:storybook-android: cd demos/storybook && yarn && cd ../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:storybook-api: cd demos/api && yarn && cd ../.. && yarn link:components
scripts.install:all: yarn && cd components && yarn install && cd .. && yarn install:showcase-ios && yarn install:storybook-ios && yarn install:storybook-api
scripts.install:all-android: cd components && yarn install && cd .. && yarn install:showcase-android && yarn install:storybook-android && yarn install:storybook-api
scripts.publish:package: cd dist && rm -f *.tgz && set npm_config_yes=true && npx -p @brightlayer-ui/publish blui-publish
scripts.tag:package: cd dist && set npm_config_yes=true && npx -p @brightlayer-ui/tag blui-tag -s -blui-react-native-component-library
scripts.start:showcase-ios: yarn install:showcase-ios && cd demos/showcase && yarn ios
scripts.start:showcase-android: yarn install:showcase-android && cd demos/showcase && yarn android
scripts.start:storybook-ios: yarn install:storybook-ios && cd demos/storybook && yarn ios
scripts.start:storybook-android: yarn install:storybook-android && cd demos/storybook && yarn android
scripts.start:storybook-api: yarn install:storybook-api && cd demos/api && yarn start
scripts.prettier: prettier "docs/**.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,css,scss,md,html}" --write && cd components && yarn prettier && cd ../demos/api && yarn prettier  && cd ../storybook && yarn prettier
scripts.prettier:check: prettier "docs/**.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,css,scss,md,html}" --check && cd components && yarn prettier:check && cd ../demos/api && yarn prettier:check && cd ../storybook && yarn prettier:check
scripts.lint: cd components && yarn lint && cd ../demos/api && yarn lint && cd ../storybook && yarn lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd components && yarn lint:fix && cd ../demos/api && yarn lint:fix && cd ../storybook && yarn lint:fix
scripts.precommit: yarn install:all && yarn prettier && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn build && yarn test:artifacts && yarn generate:licenses
